page.title: 07Sarn Chapel
page.content: The Chapel in Sarn is above the pub.It will seat about 100 people.There is an {organ.}We do not have a proper minister,but we have different{ {ministers}to take the service every week.Mostly there are only about fifteen people who go.Every Sunday morning, the service is at 10.30 until 11.30 and the one at night is at 6.30 until 7.30.During the morning service the children go out into the school-room, where Miss Evans tells them a story or we have a quiz.The school-room is joined on to the side of the chapel.We have to go down four or five steps to get into the school-room.The chapel was built in 1887 and the school-room was built in 1938.
